name: Asier's Autumn
description:
Welcome to Asier's Autumn!

Asier is a boy who has been living in a single room for a few months.

Delve into his story to find out why and keep playing to find out the end.

Inside the game you will be a spectator, but sometimes you will be able to click on some objects to discover more about his story.

Play the game and experience Asier's autumn!

Controls

This game is designed to be played with the mouse or touch screen, although you can also advance in the dialogue by pressing space.

The game has an approximate duration of 30 minutes and is intended to be played one at a time. Therefore, it does not have the option to save. 

Credits

Direction, art, narrative by Elizabeth Rosique Campa.

Programming by Jose Francisco 'Yiro' Vera Girona.

Text fonts, names and buttons by Kenney (CC0).

For the logo we have used 'Anja Eliane' (100% free for personal & commercial use).

Drop sound, arrow & dialog box by Kenney (CC0) and modified by Jose Francisco 'Yiro' Vera Girona.

Soundtrack by Komiku (CC0): Childhood Scenes & The Main Reason We Are Here.

Made with Godot, Dialogic and lots of love <3.

Why this game?

This game has been created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022) during two weeks.

This jam’s theme is: Cozy Autumn.

The optional palette is: Autumn Glow.

The optional mechanic is: One Room Only.
